name: Alien Armada
description:
This is Alien Armada, a 2D shooter made in the MSU CAS117 class. 

I have created:

1) two new, comprehensive,  unique levels

1)  Altered the Main Menu and surrounding display

3)  Changed the in-game UI to show the current mission/objective.

Credits:

Prof. Brian Winn, CAS 117, MSU
